data.title: VGG-T^3: Offline Feed-Forward 3D Reconstruction at Scale
data.description: This paper likely introduces **VGG-T^3**, a method for **offline feed-forward 3D reconstruction**. It aims to achieve this at **scale**, suggesting advancements in efficiency or handling large datasets for creating 3D models from images.

data.title: Overconfident Errors Need Stronger Correction: Asymmetric Confidence Penalties for Reinforcement Learning
data.description: This work proposes **asymmetric confidence penalties** for **reinforcement learning** algorithms. The core idea is that **overconfident errors** should receive stronger correction, aiming to improve the robustness and reliability of learned policies.

data.title: MedCLIPSeg: Probabilistic Vision-Language Adaptation for Data-Efficient and Generalizable Medical Image Segmentation
data.description: **MedCLIPSeg** introduces a method for **probabilistic vision-language adaptation** specifically for **medical image segmentation**. It focuses on achieving **data-efficient** and **generalizable** segmentation models, which is crucial for real-world healthcare applications with limited labeled data.

data.title: General Agent Evaluation
data.description: This paper focuses on the crucial task of **general agent evaluation**. It likely proposes new frameworks or metrics to assess the capabilities and performance of **AI agents** across diverse tasks and environments.

data.title: Retrieve and Segment: Are a Few Examples Enough to Bridge the Supervision Gap in Open-Vocabulary Segmentation?
data.description: This research explores whether **retrieval-based methods** can bridge the **supervision gap** in **open-vocabulary segmentation**. It investigates if **few examples** are sufficient to achieve robust segmentation for novel categories, significantly reducing annotation efforts.

data.title: No One Size Fits All: QueryBandits for Hallucination Mitigation
data.description: This paper introduces **QueryBandits**, a novel approach for **hallucination mitigation** in language models. It proposes that no single strategy fits all queries, suggesting an adaptive method to reduce **generated misinformation** and improve factual accuracy.

data.title: What Makes a Good Query? Measuring the Impact of Human-Confusing Linguistic Features on LLM Performance
data.description: This research investigates the characteristics of **effective queries** for **Large Language Models (LLMs)**. It measures the impact of **human-confusing linguistic features** on **LLM performance**, aiming to understand how query phrasing affects model outputs and develop better prompting strategies.

data.title: MEG-to-MEG Transfer Learning and Cross-Task Speech/Silence Detection with Limited Data
data.description: This paper explores **MEG-to-MEG transfer learning** for **cross-task speech/silence detection**, particularly in **limited data** scenarios. The work aims to improve the robustness and generalization of models for processing magnetoencephalography (MEG) signals.

data.title: DLT-Corpus: A Large-Scale Text Collection for the Distributed Ledger Technology Domain
data.description: The **DLT-Corpus** introduces a **large-scale text collection** specifically curated for the **Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT) domain**. This valuable **dataset** will facilitate research and development in NLP tasks related to blockchain, cryptocurrencies, and other decentralized technologies.

data.title: MobilityBench: A Benchmark for Evaluating Route-Planning Agents in Real-World Mobility Scenarios
data.description: **MobilityBench** presents a new **benchmark** designed for evaluating **route-planning agents** in **real-world mobility scenarios**. This benchmark provides a standardized platform to assess the performance and robustness of AI agents in complex, dynamic transportation environments.
